6.2.1 Copy Page

Copies the content of the currently visible page to the clipboard. This can either be an image (pages Ecological Simulation and Simplex Diagram) or HTML file (page Tournament) or plain ASCII text (page User Defined Strategies).


Eckhart Arnold 2006-10-14
